name: Roll Back (klaarkh)
description:
Find your way to hack the great computer, using your "Roll Back" to bypass firewalls.
You need to reconnect on the perfect time, in this Puzzle platformer game, but don't abuse it, or the system will spot you.

[A] & [D] to move Left and Right (or Arrow Keys)
[Space] to Jump
[Right Mouse Button] to initiate a RollBack
[Left Mouse Button] to Shoot

Player is looking in the mouse direction.
